Keywords: Animal , Fantastic Four , Inhumans
Real Name: Lockjaw
Special Powers
MASS TELEPORTATION: Passenger: 1. Passenger: 4, but only to carry characters that share a keyword.
LOYAL COMPANION, FIERCE PROTECTOR: Friendly adjacent characters that share a keyword can use Mastermind, but only to choose Lockjaw.
HE WON'T LET GO!: When Lockjaw attacks, missed targets gain Immobile until your next turn.
